title: Why a downsized central bank reflects major shifts in China’s financial governance strategy
description: Why a downsized People’s Bank of China reflects major shifts in the nation’s financial governance strategy.

title: Canada says China-linked ‘Spamouflage’ campaign targeted lawmakers and PM Trudeau
description: The campaign involved bots posting disinformation and propaganda on the social media accounts of members of parliament, including accusations against the MPs of criminal and ethical violations.

title: China’s ambassador to Brazil makes Belt and Road Initiative pitch, appealing to ‘higher level’ of ties
description: Beijing seeks to leverage signature global trading network to boost port services integration, e-commerce collaboration and digital trade, says envoy.

title: China’s former economic tsar still has a big seat at the table, quietly meets with Western delegations: sources
description: China’s former vice-premier may be staying out of the public limelight, but President Xi Jinping has kept the 71-year-old in a position of influence, skirting customs and traditions in difficult economic times.

title: Hypersonic Race 2.0: China tests next-gen ‘waverider’ with revolutionary technology
description: Scientists have developed a breakthrough surface material previously thought to be impossible.

title: China, Philippines war of words over South China Sea collisions is a ‘test’ raising risk of hot conflict, observer says
description: Face-off could damage trust and affect ongoing South China Sea code of conduct talks, researcher at National Institute for South China Sea Studies warns.

title: By blaming China for its trade deficit, EU is barking up the wrong tree
description: Instead of complaining about the lack of access to China’s market, Brussels should raise its own productivity and rethink the many ways it is stoking bilateral tension while reducing trade.

title: Taiwan’s military must objectively assess PLA then ‘strengthen ourselves’, defence chief says
description: Defence Minister Chiu Kuo-cheng says island won’t rely on People’s Liberation Army having ‘certain shortcomings’ in preparing for possible conflict.

title: China’s debt crises, from developers to local governments, prompt cabinet call to curb contagion
description: Debt problems that have manifested in Evergrande and Country Garden cases are prompting China’s central bank to step up risk-monitoring of lenders and local government financing vehicles.

title: Israel-Gaza war: China will ‘do anything’ to restore peace, but ‘prospects are worrying’, envoy says
description: Envoy Zhai Jun says China is ‘deeply concerned’ about the conflict as he continues his Middle East visit.

title: China wants to ‘work with Japan to relive spirit’ of 1978 peace and friendship treaty
description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang and Japan’s Prime Minister Fumio Kishida exchange congratulatory messages to mark 45th year of landmark pact, as the two countries remain at odds over various issues, most recently the Fukushima waste water release.

title: Soong Mei-ling: ‘the eternal first lady of China’ — from the SCMP archive
description: We revisit our coverage 20 years after the passing of Soong Mei-ling, wife of Chiang Kai-shek, on October 23, 2003.

title: China scraps price caps in bid to revive land sales, tweaks rule to allow lower-density suburban projects
description: Municipalities have been directed to drop a 15 per cent price premium on land sales, which fell 80 per cent in 2022 and 33 per cent this year. The impact on demand ‘might be quite limited’, an analyst says.

title: China’s belt and road pivots to ‘small yet smart’ projects with ‘modest’ US$107 billion financing pledge
description: Xi Jinping says Beijing will spend less on loans than in previous years while stressing green, low-cost programmes, signalling China is seeking ‘more bang for its buck’ in global infrastructure strategy, observers say.

title: Disappearing dim sum in Hong Kong, TikTok star Gym Tan, Rwandan-Chinese couples: 5 weekend reads you may have missed
description: From Hong Kong’s disappearing dim sum to 63-year-old TikTok star Gym Tan, here are stories you may have missed over the weekend.

title: Chinese scientists’ new map of the Milky Way turns the tables on cosmic radiation theories
description: Researchers manage to use gamma rays to peek into the origins of cosmic radiation.
